ConfigWindow_Header: 自动攻击设置（开源免费） v
ConfigWindow_ActionItem_Description: In this panel, you can modify the use conditions for every action.
ConfigWindow_HelpItem_Description: In this panel, you can see all commands for combat that can use in for XIV Auto Attack
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackSmart: Start Attacking in auto-target mode when not in combat. Switch the targeting condition in combat.
Configwindow_HelpItem_AttackCancel: Stop Attacking, please always do it!
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealArea: Open one window period to use one or serveral range healing actions.
Configwindow_HelpItem_HealSingle: Open one window period to use one or serveral single healing actions.
Configwidow_HelpItem_DefenseArea: Open one window period to use one or serveral range defense actions.
Configwidow_HelpItem_DefenseSingle: Open one window period to use one or serveral single defense actions.
Configwidow_HelpItem_EsunaShield: Open one window period to use Esuna,tank stance skills or True North.
Configwidow_HelpItem_RaiseShirk: Open one window period to use Raise or Shirk.
Configwidow_HelpItem_AntiRepulsion: Open one window period to use knockback-penalty skill.
Configwidow_HelpItem_BreakProvoke: Open one window period to use break-combo or provoke skill.
Configwidow_HelpItem_Move: Open one window period to use move skill.
